hero.subtitle: Discover the soul of Italy: authentic homemade cuisine in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

pizza.title: Pizza
pizza.desc: Our pizzas are prepared following Italian tradition, with handcrafted long-fermentation dough, fresh ingredients, and perfect baking that achieves the ideal balance between texture and flavor. Crispy on the outside, light on the inside, and always authentic.

pasta.title: Our Dishes
pasta.desc: Each dish is born from tradition and love for Italian cuisine. Flavors reminiscent of nonna’s recipes, carefully selected ingredients, and attention to every detail to ensure every bite is a warm, authentic, and memorable experience.

reviews.label: Testimonials
reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: We are proud to offer an unforgettable culinary experience. Rated 4.9/5 stars across major platforms.
reviews.review1: “A very cozy place with incredible owners — you feel at home while enjoying their wonderful food.”
reviews.review2: “Excellent and highly personalized service, run by the owners themselves. Generous portions and everything is delicious. A calm and family-friendly place.”

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Do you have a question or request?
contact.subtitle: Whether you want to book a table, ask about allergies, or simply say hello, fill out the form and our team will get back to you soon.

footer.description: Bringing authentic Italian flavors to your table. Experience true Italian cuisine in the heart of the city.

payments.title: Card Payments
payments.desc: We accept credit or debit card payments for orders over 30€.

access.title: Accessibility
access.desc: Due to the architecture of our building, we unfortunately do not have wheelchair access.

pets.title: Pets
pets.desc: To ensure the comfort of all our guests during service, pets are not allowed inside.

smoking.title: Smoke-Free Environment
smoking.desc: We are a 100% smoke-free establishment. Smoking is not permitted anywhere on our premises.
